content.title: Counter
content.shortDescription: Simple, easy to use, ad-free tally counter.
content.fullDescription:
Track multiple counters with their own names and values. Values can be changed using volume buttons. There is a way to export all counters into a CSV file.
This is an open source application. If you want to fix a bug or propose a new feature, check out the project on GitHub: https://counter.roman.zone
If you want to help with translation, please go to https://counter.roman.zone/translation
Thank you for using the app! I hope you find it useful.
